description: Listed Building Consent  in association with refurbishment of two self-contained flats with rear alterations including the enlargement of a rear ground floor window to create a doorway, construction of decking across the rear lightwell, removal of structure from front lightwell and installation of new door/windows and numerous other internal alterations.
decision_conditions: INFORMATIVE:  In order to progress the redevelopment of this Grade II listed property you are strongly advised to engage a qualified architect with experience of working with statutorily listed buildings.  An architect of this experience should be able to guide you in forming your plans for redevelopment in terms of what historic features of the property must be retained, clarifying the drawings to show all proposed works in detail and drafting detailed and consistent drawings.
